channel.title: Help running my server
channel.description: okay i archived my server and then i uploaded to a file sharing website. I told my friend he went to download and extracted when he went to play he tried to log in. It said error connecting to server what do i do? I only archived the client do i have to do something else. I can get on the server but no one else can.

item.title: Help running my server
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

go into gui.java and search “ip” then change it and put the one u want in the quotes

Read full topic
